Title: We Shall Live Forever
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Jonathan Tropper
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Olek finds Ana and Hood in Banshee. The ensuing showdown results in dire consequences. George seeks answers for Carrie's behavior. Rebecca is shunned by the Amish. Proctor pleads with his aunt and father to take her back.
